About the Company: Steel Strips Wheels Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of single piece steel wheel rims in the range of 10 to 30 inches dia for scooters, passenger cars, utility vehicles and tractors.The product range of the company includes single piece steel wheel rims for:Passenger Cars, 2/3 wheelers.Commercial Vehicles & Earth Mover Segment.Tractors Segment.Caravans Segment.
